name: google-news-rss-pipeline
description: Offline-friendly Google News RSS ingestion pipeline for LLM integration

scripts.start: python3 -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt && python3 src/main.py --run-now
scripts.schedule: python3 -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt && python3 src/main.py --schedule
scripts.test: python3 -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt && python3 -m pytest tests/ -v

author: RSS Collector Team
